page.title: 06Transport
page.content: There is an old disused Railway Station which is now used for two businesses.One of them is a childrens nursery and the other one is a tool hire called Station Tool Hire,and some of it is a house.The Station closed down in 1963. Nursery cot room-Genoral Waiting room. Nursery main room-Ticket office. Longroom-Open on platform. Utility room-Ladies waiting room. New kitchen-Back parlour. Lounge-Two sitting rooms. Bathroom-kitchen. Original bathroom-demolished. Tool Building-Warehouse. Most people travel by car or bus to work in Hull,Hull is the main employment centre for people of working age.
